piston2.description: Medium quality pistons for a combustion engine. Pistons convert expanding combustion gases into the motion that turns a crankshaft.

sparkplug2.name: ふつうの点火プラグ
sparkplug2.description: Medium quality spark plugs for a combustion engine. Spark plugs ignite the fuel/air mixture to move the pistons.

valve2.name: ふつうのバルブ
valve2.description: Medium quality poppet valves for a combustion engine. Valves control the intake and exhaust flow.

metalblade.name: ブレード
metalblade.description:
Metal blades are common components that can be found in barrels near roads or at monuments. They are used to craft some tools and melee weapons.

If you don't have any use for the items you can craft with these it would be wise to recycle them for two scrap.

metalpipe.name: パイプ
metalpipe.description: Pipes are a relatively common component that are used for guns, salvaged tools, and rocket launchers and rockets. They can be somewhat abundant early game until you find the need to craft rockets, and then get consumed very quickly.

metalspring.name: バネ
metalspring.description: An uncommon component used for the construction of almost every gun. It may be found with moderate frequency from crates, and uncommonly from barrels. Generally speaking, guns of higher tiers will require more Metal Springs, while low tier guns (Semi Auto Pistol, Rifle) require only one.

vehicle.1mod.rear.seats.name: リアシート カーモジュール
vehicle.1mod.rear.seats.description: Single module seating for two passengers.

riflebody.name: ライフルボディ
riflebody.description: A rare component which is used for crafting late-game rifles. It can only be found in military and elite crates.

roadsigns.name: 道路看板
roadsigns.description: Road signs are a component used in the crafting of the mid-tier armors Road Sign Jacket, and Road Sign Kilt, along with crafting the salvaged cleaver. Also good as a source of scrap throughout the game.

rope.name: ロープ
rope.description:
Rope is quite common component used in many items like wooden armor, satchel charges, ladders and shotgun traps. Because of that it remains relatively useful throughout the whole game.

It can be often found in barrels alongside sewing kits which can be recycled for even more rope.

smgbody.name: SMGボディ
smgbody.description: A rare component which is used for crafting submachine guns. It can only be found in military and elite crates.

semibody.name: セミオートボディ
semibody.description: Semi Automatic Bodies are components used in the crafting of Semi-Auto Pistols and Semi-Auto Rifles. They can be found quite commonly and can be recycled for a good profit.

sewingkit.name: ソーイングキット
sewingkit.description: Sewing Kits are highly valued by mid to high tier players for their use in both roadsign and metal Armour.

sheetmetal.name: シートメタル
sheetmetal.description: An uncommon component that can be recycled into Metal Fragments and High Quality Metal, or used in the crafting of Heavy Plate armor pieces. It can be found in crates and barrels.

sticks.name: スティック
sticks.description: Sticks is an item that currently serves no purpose in the game.

vehicle.1mod.storage.name: ストレージカーモジュール

tarp.name: タープ
tarp.description: Tarps are used for the crafting of planter boxes, and water catchers. They can also be recycled for 50x cloth each. These are very common and can prove to be a good source of cloth.

vehicle.1mod.taxi.name: タクシーカーモジュール
vehicle.1mod.taxi.description: Single module seating for two passengers, with a window and a shop front at the front.

techparts.name:
武器ボックスの他に、CCTVカメラやPCリサイクルからもゲットできる。
C4やレーザーサイト、ホロサイトをクラフトするのに使う。
（リサイクラー：スクラップ・上金属）
techparts.description: Tech Trash is an essential component in Timed Explosive Charges and weapon attachments. Tech Trash can be gained via military crates or the recycler.

electric.andswitch.name: ANDスイッチ
electric.andswitch.description: A logic gate that allows eletrical passthrough if BOTH inputs receives power, passthrough amount is the greater of either power source.

electric.audioalarm.name: オーディオアラーム
electric.audioalarm.description: A speaker which will emit a loud warning alarm when powered.

autoturret.name: ターレット
autoturret.description:
The Auto Turret is a placed object used to detect enemies and shoot with its armed weapon. It detects enemies if the enemies were to reach its 180 degrees detection range or shoot the turret. The Auto Turret ignores the Tool Cupboard authorizations and only shoot people not in its authorize list so you and your team must authorize to it manually.

You can arm any ranged weapons onto the Auto Turret and insert the ammo of the equipped weapon. You must turn the turret off in order to refill ammo and weapon slot.

The Auto Turret can be turned on if the Power In slot is powering at least 10 rWm. There are 3 extra slots (Has Target, Low Ammo, No Ammo) that you can set up with Smart Alarm or traps, you must have 11 rWm for the Auto Turret to power the 3 slots. As an example, if someone walks into the detection range of the Auto Turret, 1 rWm will be used up to power out the Has Target slot.

The Auto Turret has 2 modes, Peacekeeper and Attack All. By default, Attack All mode makes the turret targets unauthorized players. Peacekeeper mode only shoots hostile players that has the red sight icon on the top right corner, it works just like the Outpost turrets and Bandit Camp turrets.

electric.blocker.name: ブロッカー
electric.blocker.description: This object prevents passthrough while power is received through its second input.

electric.button.name: ボタン
electric.button.description: If pressed on, Output sends power for a few seconds and deactivates itself. Works like a timer with no ability to change the time.

electric.cabletunnel.name: ケーブルのトンネル
electric.cabletunnel.description: Allows you to pass a cable through a wall. Each input will forward the amount it receives to the corresponding output on the other side.

ceilinglight.name: シーリングライト
ceilinglight.description: A small ceiling mounted light source. It speeds up plants in a planter growth by 2x.

computerstation.name: コンピュータステーション
computerstation.description: The Computer Station can be used for real-time surveillance by pairing with any available CCTV Cameras. There are specific monuments with indestructible CCTV Cameras, the IDs are static and cannot be changed.

electric.counter.name: Counter
electric.counter.description: A basic cathode ray tube screen combined with an incremental counter. Can display power received, or can count upwards and allow passthrough when a target is reached.

xmas.lightstring.advanced.name: デラックスクリスマスライト
xmas.lightstring.advanced.description: Colored, Animated, Powered Lights. Requires 5 electricity. Click to start placement, right click to end. Each unit is 0.5m long.

electric.digitalclock.name: デジタルクロック
electric.digitalclock.description: A digital clock that displays the server time and lets you set alarms to pass power through when ringing. Ideal for synchronizing traps or timed events.

electric.doorcontroller.name: ドア コントローラー
electric.doorcontroller.description: A Door Controller. Will manipulate the state of the closest door when it recieves power.

electric.furnace.name: でんきかまど
electric.furnace.description: An electrical version of a furnace that uses electricity instead of a fuel source.

electric.heater.name: ヒーター
electric.heater.description:
The Electric Heater is very useful for bases on snow biome, it will completely remove the "TOO COLD" status and provide 50% "COMFORT" status when nearby, thus regenerating your health.

It can also be placed nearby plants to provide 100% temperature. However, placing electric heater in desert biome may downgrade the temperature of plants. This can also apply to players.

electrical.branch.name: エレクトリカル・ブランチ
electrical.branch.description: This object allows you to branch power off from a main line by a set amount.

elevator.name: エレベーター
elevator.description: A powered elevator. Place another elevator above or below this to connect it. Requires power.

fluid.combiner.name: 流体コンバイナー
fluid.combiner.description: Combines three separate fluid connections into one connection.

fluid.splitter.name: レールスプリッター
fluid.splitter.description: Splits a fluid connection into three separate connections.

fluid.switch.name: 流体スイッチ & ポンプ
fluid.switch.description: A simple switch that enables fluid to pass through. Can be switched on/off manually or via electricity. Can also pump water upwards to higher entities when powered.

industrial.wall.light.green.name: グリーンウォールライト
industrial.wall.light.green.description: The Green Industrial Wall Light has the same function as the White Industrial Wall but emits a green light.

electric.hbhfsensor.name: HBHFセンサー
electric.hbhfsensor.description: A Hearbeat, Breathing, Humidity and Footstep sensor. Passthrough is equal to the number of humans detected in a roughly 3.6 squares radius with line of sight. Configurable with hammer.

hosetool.name: ホースのツール
hosetool.description: A tool used to make fluid connections between objects. Aim at an object and click on an input/output handle, then click on another object's input/output handle to form a connection.

electric.igniter.name: イグナイター
electric.igniter.description: Ignites nearby objects such as furnaces and campfires when power is received

industrial.combiner.name: こうぎょう用コンバイナー
industrial.combiner.description: Combines three separate industrial connections into one connection.

industrial.conveyor.name: こうぎょう用コンベアー
industrial.conveyor.description: Moves an item from one container to another.

industrial.crafter.name: こうぎょう用クラフター
industrial.crafter.description: Attaches to a workbench to allow automated crafting.

industrial.splitter.description: Splits an industrial connection into three separate connections.

industrial.wall.light.name: ウォールライト
industrial.wall.light.description:
The Industrial Wall Light is a mountable light that can be placed on walls, ceilings or floors. It functions just like the Ceiling Light with smaller light radius. There are 3 variations of the Industrial Wall Light, White, Green and Red.

It was released with the mandatory update "Nomad" that came along with the permanent shop.

sign.neon.xl.animated.name: 大きなアニメーションネオンサイン

electric.battery.rechargable.large.description: A Large Rechargable Battery. Must have a minimum charge of 5 seconds to discharge. Can be wired in series. Charging rate is dependant on power in, with a maximum of 80% efficiency.

electric.solarpanel.large.name: ソーラーパネル
electric.solarpanel.large.description: A solar panel which converts sunlight into energy. The amount of energy generated is dependent on the sun's intensity and angle to the panel.

electrical.memorycell.name: メモリーセル
electrical.memorycell.description: A 1 bit storage component. The SET Input will set the value to 1. The RESET Input sets the value to 0. Output will pass connected power if value is 1, Inverted Output will pass connected power if value is 0. This is also known as a D-Type Flip Flop.

modularcarlift.name: モジュラーリフト
modularcarlift.description:
Allows you to modify modular vehicles. Modules can be fully repaired more cost-effective than manual repair by hammer. Cannot move or remove modules with items inside (liquid in fluid tank, items in storage module, parts in engine), but allows you to quick-remove all items. Can add/remove a locks to/from cockpit module and craft keys (lock is removed when module is removed from chassis).

Removing modules can let you research them to be crafted and placed on other chassis later, and removing all modules from a chassis presents you the option to destroy the chassis.

As of "Mixing Table Update," cars no longer decay on powered lifts.

electric.orswitch.name: ORスイッチ
electric.orswitch.description: A logic gate that allows eletrical passthrough if EITHER input receives power, passthrough amount is the greater of either power source.

ptz.cctv.camera.name: PTZ CCTVカメラ
ptz.cctv.camera.description: A CCTV Camera system can be used for realtime surveillance and security when paired with the Computer Station. This camera has pan, tilt, and zoom capability.

pipetool.name: パイプ ツール
pipetool.description: A tool used to make connections between industrial objects. Aim at an object and click on an input/output handle, then click on another object's input/output handle to form a connection. Holding right mouse will clear or cancel a connection.

powered.water.purifier.name: パワードウォータークリーナー
powered.water.purifier.description: A device that converts salt water to fresh water while powered.

electric.pressurepad.name: プレッシャーパッド
electric.pressurepad.description: A gate which allows power to flow while a player is standing on it.

electric.random.switch.name: RANDスイッチ
electric.random.switch.description: This switch will allow passthrough based on a random number. Each time the 'Set' input receives power it will roll true or false to allow passthrough.

electric.rf.broadcaster.name: RFブロードキャスター
electric.rf.broadcaster.description: The RF Broadcaster is a electric component that sends out a signal at a frequency. It is possible to make a trap with the RF Broadcaster.

rf_pager.name: RFポケベル
rf_pager.description: An RF Pager. An audible tone will be produced when a signal is picked up on the listening frequency. Can be set to silent mode.

electric.rf.receiver.name: RFレシーバー
electric.rf.receiver.description: RF Receiver is capable of receiving RF signals from RF Broadcaster or RF Transmitter, if both signal matches, Power Out will start receiving power.

target.reactive.name: リアクティブターゲット
target.reactive.description: Reactive Targets are handy for practicing your marksmanship without chasing around those slippery newmans. After sustaining enough damage, they fall backwards and reset after a few seconds.

industrial.wall.light.red.name: レッドウォールライト
industrial.wall.light.red.description: The Red Industrial Wall Light has the same function as the White Industrial Wall but emits a red light.

electrical.combiner.name: ルートコンバイナー
electrical.combiner.description: This object combines two root electrical sources into a single signal. Helpful for stringing together low energy batteries or solar panels to produce higher power output.

searchlight.name: サーチ ライト
searchlight.description: The search light is a deployable item which produces a bright beam of light. It has a 360 degree range of motion, and can be controlled by a player. It runs on electricity much like auto turrets.

electric.seismicsensor.name: セスミックセンサー
electric.seismicsensor.description: A small device that detects vibrations within a set range. Will output a different power value depending on the explosive type detected, ideal to know when your time has come.

electric.fuelgenerator.small.description: A small electric generator powered by Low Grade Fuel that outputs 40 power.

electric.battery.rechargable.small.description: A small rechargable battery. Must have a minimum charge of 5 seconds to discharge. Can be wired in series. Charging rate is dependant on power in, with a maximum of 80% efficiency.

smart.alarm.description: Sends a notifications to your phone when powered on.

smart.switch.name: スマートスイッチ
smart.switch.description: The Smart Switch is an upgrade to the normal Switch. It does not allow unauthorized players to use the Smart Switch and it can be paired to your phone.

electric.splitter.description: Splits an electrical signal into 3 multiple signals. the amount passed through is equal to the input amount divided by the number of used output slots.

electric.sprinkler.name: スプリンクラー
electric.sprinkler.description: A small sprinkler that sprays water around it. Requires a hose connection to supply it with water.

storageadaptor.name: ストレージのアダプター
storageadaptor.description: Attach to a storage container to allow industrial input/output connections.

storage.monitor.name: ストレージのモニター
storage.monitor.description: The Storage Monitor attaches to the Tool Cupboard, Large Storage Box, and Vending Machine to monitor the container contents. Output sends a pulse when the container is updated.

electric.teslacoil.description: An electrical trap that zaps nearby players when powered. More power supplied will result in higher damage. Loses durability with use.

electric.generator.small.name: 小型ジェネレーター
electric.generator.small.description:
The Test Generator is most known for debugging with electrical stuff. It will always generate 100 power and can be placed anywhere.

It is unobtainable through normal gameplay and can only be obtained by admins.

electric.timer.name: タイマー
electric.timer.description: A Timer switch, will pass power through for duration.

waterpump.name: 水ポンプ
waterpump.description: Can be placed in a water source to collect that water while powered. Can be connected to other Water entities.

generator.wind.scrap.name: ふうしゃ
generator.wind.scrap.description: Converts kinetic energy harvested from the wind into electricity. Amount generated will vary depending on wind speed. Higher altitudes will yield stronger winds.

wiretool.name: ワイヤー ツール
wiretool.description:
A tool used to make connections between electrical objects.

To use the Wire Tool, aim at an electrical object to highlight the available inputs and outputs (connections). Press the LMB to attach wires to these connections (wires can clip through any item). To disconnect a wired connection, highlight the connection and hold RMB. Wired connections can be disconnected with RMB while simultaneously holding a wire to then be connected. Electrical components will automatically grey out connections that cannot be paired based on their type (input vs output). Hold R to view wire color wheel.

electric.xorswitch.name: XORスイッチ
electric.xorswitch.description: An exclusive-or logic gate that allows eletrical passthrough if ONLY ONE input receives power, passthrough amount is whichever single input is active. if BOTH inputs recieve power, passthrough will be zero.

abovegroundpool.name: おくがい用の大きなプール。
abovegroundpool.description: A large wooden pool that can be filled with water.

fun.guitar.name: ギター
fun.guitar.description: The acoustic guitar can be played with different notes using mouse 1 and 2, and at a variable pitch relative to where the player is looking on the vertical plane.

beachchair.name: ビーチ チェア
beachchair.description: The Beach Chair is the best way to relax, whether it's by the pool or on the beach.

beachparasol.name: ビーチパラソル
beachparasol.description: A large umbrella that will shield you from the sun.

beachtable.name: ビーチ テーブル
beachtable.description: A small table to hold your drinks while relaxing.

beachtowel.name: ビーチタオル
beachtowel.description: A colourful beach towel. Placing this will give you a location to respawn.

firework.boomer.blue.name: ブルーのブーマー
firework.boomer.blue.description: A very large mortar type firework with a blue starburst

firework.romancandle.blue.name: ブルーローマンキャンドル
firework.romancandle.blue.description: A small repeating firework, shoots a series of Blue balls into the air

boogieboard.name: ビート板
boogieboard.description: Use the boogie board to catch some sick waves.

boombox.name: ブームボックス
boombox.description: A large speaker to play recorded cassette tapes which can also stream audio from the internet. Open the settings to change audio options.

fun.tambourine.name: 缶のタンバリン
fun.tambourine.description: A selection of crumpled cans assembled into a ring to produce some great background percussion.

vehicle.car_radio.name: カーラジオ
vehicle.car_radio.description: A small radio to use in cars. Will only work while the car is turned on.

cassette.name: カセット - ロング
cassette.description: A tape that you can record audio on to using a Cassette Recorder. Stores up to 30s of audio.

cassette.medium.name: カセット  -  ミディアム
cassette.medium.description: A tape that you can record audio on to using a Cassette Recorder. Stores up to 20s of audio.

cassette.short.name: カセット - ショート
cassette.short.description: A tape that you can record audio on to using a Cassette Recorder. Stores up to 10s of audio.

fun.casetterecorder.name: カセット
fun.casetterecorder.description: Insert a cassette and play the recorded audio with [attack], [attack2] to record new audio and [+reload] to throw.

firework.boomer.champagne.name: シャンパンのブーマー
firework.boomer.champagne.description: A very large mortar type firework with an massive champagne colored explosion followed by smaller orange starbursts

confetticannon.name: コンフェッティキャノン
confetticannon.description: Blast a cloud of birthday themed confetti cheer.

connected.speaker.name: コネクトされたスピーカー
connected.speaker.description: A small speaker that will play any audio from a connected Boom Box.

fun.cowbell.name: ベル
fun.cowbell.description: A road sign that's been repurposed to produce some beautiful, calming, percussion.

discoball.name: ディスコボール
discoball.description: Get groovy with this stunning disco ball.

discofloor.name: ディスコ フロア
discofloor.description: A vibrant flashing floor that pulses in time to music.

lunar.firecrackers.name: ファイアクラッカーシャワー

firework.boomer.green.name: グリーンのブーマー
firework.boomer.green.description: A very large mortar type firework with a green starburst

firework.romancandle.green.name: グリーンローマンのキャンドル
firework.romancandle.green.description: A small repeating firework, shoots a series of Green balls into the air

innertube.name: うきわ
innertube.description: An inflated tube for aquatic activities.

fun.jerrycanguitar.name: ジェリカンのギター
fun.jerrycanguitar.description: Take advantage of the unique acoustics of the Jerry Can Guitar to play some rustic tunes.

drumkit.name: ジャンクヤードドラムキット
drumkit.description: An array of pots, pans and buckets that passes as a serviceable Drum Kit. Three cymbals, some Tom Drums and a Kick Drum means you can easily lay down a beat.

laserlight.name: レーザーライト
laserlight.description: A small device that shoots out visible lasers in time to music.

megaphone.name: メガフォン
megaphone.description: A megaphone that lets you broadcast your voice. [attack] to activate your voice.

microphonestand.name: マイクロホンスタンド
microphonestand.description: A powered microphone that lets you broadcast your voice. Press [+attack2] to change voice mode between high and low pitch.

mobilephone.name: モバイル フォン
mobilephone.description: A mobile phone that lets you place calls from anywhere. Truly cutting edge Cobalt technology. Use [attack] to access the dialer.

newyeargong.name: 新年のゴング
newyeargong.description: Ring in the Lunar new year with a massive gong!

firework.boomer.orange.name: オレンジのブーマー
firework.boomer.orange.description: A very large mortar type firework with an orange starburst

paddlingpool.name: 子供用プール
paddlingpool.description: A small inflatable pool that you can fill up with water.

fun.flute.name: フルート
fun.flute.description: A set of repurposed PVC pipes that can be used to play a variety of melodies.

firework.boomer.pattern.name: パターンのブーマー
firework.boomer.pattern.description: A special boomer which allows you light up the night sky with a custom pattern that you draw. Multiple colors and altitude settings are available.

fun.trumpet.name: トランペット
fun.trumpet.description: Toot your own horn with this brassy improvised Trumpet.

fun.boomboxportable.name: ポータブルラジカセ
fun.boomboxportable.description:
The Portable Boom Box can stream real world radio stations, and you can only use it on your hands. Voice Props DLC is required to craft it.

Stationary Boom Boxes can be found in the Underwater labs. These can be useful to drown out and "hide" your stepping sounds. Other players may have muted streams and cannot hear Boomboxes, making them useless to cover your steps.

Custom Streams have to be provided by the Server.

firework.boomer.red.name: レッドのブーマー
firework.boomer.red.description: A very large mortar type firework with a red starburst

firework.romancandle.red.name: レッドローマンのキャンドル
firework.romancandle.red.description: A small repeating firework, shoots a series of red balls into the air

firework.volcano.red.name: レッドボルケーノの花火
firework.volcano.red.description: Emits a beautiful shower of red sparks

fun.bass.name: シャベルベース
fun.bass.description: Use this stringed together shovel to play some deep, deep tunes.

skullspikes.name: スカルスパイク
skullspikes.description: A spike of several skulls. Very spooky.

skull.trophy.name: スカルトロフィー
skull.trophy.description: A decorative mount that can hold the skull of a friend or foe.

skylantern.name: スカイランタン
skylantern.description: A beautiful sky lantern. Can be launched in any direction. Has one inventory slot. Can be Ignited with a lit torch.

sled.name: そり
sled.description: A wooden sled to quickly travel down snowy hills.

soundlight.name: サウンドライト
soundlight.description: A light that will pulse in time to music when connected to a Boom Box.

fun.tuba.name: チューバ
fun.tuba.description: A collection of used piping that’s been converted into a Tuba. Probably not very hygienic.

telephone.name: テレフォン
telephone.description: Use the telephone to call other telephones on the island!

C4やレーザーサイト、ホロサイトをクラフトするのに使う。
（リサイクラー：スクラップ・上金属）

firework.boomer.violet.description: A very large mortar type firework with a violet starburst

firework.romancandle.violet.name: バイオレットローマンのキャンドル
firework.romancandle.violet.description: A small repeating firework, shoots a series of Violet balls into the air

firework.volcano.violet.name: バイオレットボルケーノの花火
firework.volcano.violet.description: Emits a beautiful shower of Violet sparks

piano.name: ピアノ
piano.description: The Piano is a repurposed wheelbarrow that weighs a ton, but makes up for it with a wide range of notes.

firework.volcano.name: ホワイトボルケーノの花火
firework.volcano.description: Emits a beautiful shower of white sparks

wrappingpaper.name: ラッピングペーパー
wrappingpaper.description: Use this to conceal any item in a lazily wrapped gift

xylophone.name: シロボーン
xylophone.description: A selection of bones that were “acquired” for their acoustic attributes. Play a lullaby for your camp with these soothing tones.
